products.title: Cotton Jersey Overshirt
products.description: This cotton-blend jersey overshirt is great for when you need that extra layer. Regular fit, with a button-through fastening, classic collared neck and two practical chest pockets. Fabric is brushed on the inside for extra warmth and comfort. All of the cotton for our clothing is sustainably sourced and always will be. M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles.

products.title: Pure Cotton Check Oxford Shirt
products.description: Keep cool on warmer days with this gingham Oxford shirt made in breathable cotton. Cut to a regular fit, with short sleeves and a button-down collar. Convenient easy-to-iron finish means it just needs a quick press and it's ready to go. All of the cotton for our clothing is sustainably sourced and always will be. M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles.

products.title: Tiger Print Shirt
products.description: With its breezy fabric and pretty broderie detailing, this Per Una blouse has easy summer days written all over it. The regular style is made from lightweight textured cotton and features pleating at the neckline for an effortless silhouette. Three-quarter length sleeves with elasticated cuffs and broderie frills give a delicate finish. All of the cotton for our clothing is sustainably sourced and always will be. Per Una: stylish designs crafted with carefully considered details and feminine flourishes.

products.title: Soft Touch Palm Print Shirt
products.description:
With a lively splash of print, this long-sleeved shirt is full of contemporary appeal. Designed in our comfortable regular fit with a classic collared neck. Made with recycled polyester.

products.description: Make laid-back dressing on warmer days easy with this versatile shirt. Regular fit, for a traditional look. Made from breathable pure linen with a contemporary grandad collar. products.title: Easy Iron Linen Striped Shirt
products.description: This striped linen-blend shirt is ideal for summery days. Cut a little narrower across the shoulders and waist in our regular fit. Handy easy-to-iron finish. Our moisture-wicking Cool Comfort technology helps keep you cool all day long. All of the cotton for our clothing is sustainably sourced and always will be.

products.title: Linen Hawaiian Shirt
products.description: This vibrant linen-rich Hawaiian shirt will add a tropical touch to your wardrobe. Collared regular fit design with a classic button-through fastening. Easy-to-iron fabric with a moisture-wicking finish for all-day comfort. M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles. Made with sustainably sourced viscose.

products.title: Cotton Print Shirt
products.description: Keep your smart-casual style on point with this printed Autograph cotton-rich shirt. Our regular cut creates a traditional fit, that's slightly narrower through the waist. Classic collar neckline. Super soft on skin. Made with sustainably sourced Tencel™ lyocell. Autograph: premium investment pieces featuring contemporary cuts and refined finishing touches.
